skill name (english): Because Our Feelings Are the Same
skill effect (japanese): 5秒間 スコアが100%UPする 自身を除き「MORE MORE JUMP！」メンバーを1人編成する毎にスコアが10%UPし、全員一致で更に10%UPする（最大150%)
skill effect (english): 100% score boost for 5 seconds. Gain additional +10% boost for every [MORE MORE JUMP!] card (except for themselves), and another +10% boost if all cards are from the same unit (up to 150%).
